name: Luis Alberto Suárez Díaz

structured_info.background: Luis Suárez is a highly prolific Uruguayan footballer, known for his goal-scoring record exceeding 500 career goals and earning the nickname 'El Pistolero'. He is the all-time leading goalscorer for Uruguay, having represented his nation in four FIFA World Cups and five Copa América tournaments, winning the 2011 Copa América and being named Best Player. He has a reputation for both exceptional skill and controversial behaviour.

summary: Luis Suárez is a celebrated Uruguayan professional footballer currently playing for Inter Miami CF.  Renowned as one of the best strikers of his generation, he's distinguished by his prolific goal-scoring ability, significant international achievements with Uruguay, and successful club career spanning several top European clubs.

name: Luis Suárez Miramontes

structured_info.background: A Spanish professional footballer and manager recognized as one of the greatest Spanish players ever. He was an elegant midfielder who competed from 1957-1972, achieving significant success with both club and country.

summary: Luis Suárez Miramontes is a celebrated Spanish footballer and manager known for his elegant playing style. He enjoyed a distinguished career with clubs like Barcelona and Inter Milan, and the Spanish national team, winning the 1964 European Championship and the 1960 Ballon d'Or.
